analysis.description:
Memes.Payout (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#87-101) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- PotOwner.transfer(pay) (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#91-92)

Memes.DoDev (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#169-176) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(dval) (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol)

Memes.Buy (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#101-169) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- TimeFinish == 0
	- TimeFinish == 1

Memes.Payout (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#87-101) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(TimeFinish > 1) (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#89-90)
	- require(bool)(TimeFinish < block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#88-89)

Memes.Buy (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#101-169) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- TimeFinish == 1 (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#110-113)
	- TimeFinish == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#104-113)
	- TimeLeft < TimerStartTime (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#153-157)
	- TimeFinish < block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#120-168)

Memes.BasicPrice should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#28-30)
Memes.DIVP should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#18-19)
Memes.PIncr should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#16-17)
Memes.POTP should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#20)
Memes.TimerResetTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#12)
Memes.TimerStartTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#13-14)
Memes.WPOTPART should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#22)
Memes.helper should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#9-11)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'ID' of Memes.Buy (/unique_contracts/0x6aa03faa7856c5fb8671a174d742eedb46b12d66.sol#101-102) is not in mixedCase
